author: @AkshayAradhya
text: I am no expert in electronics, but I have told that you should use a voltage divider. The way you have connected is  Echo 5v -----> 1k Ohm Resistor ----> GPIO Pin Adding a resistor wont reduce the voltage, only the current. So you are stll giving a 5v to the GPIO input pin which is bad.  Someone correct me if I am wrong..
